result.reason: Feature request to show a blank/placeholder panel when selecting a disconnected connection in the tree, improving UX by giving visual feedback instead of showing nothing or stale content.
result.approach: When a disconnected connection node is selected in the tree, display a blank panel or placeholder with connection info and a Connect button, instead of showing no content or the last active tab.

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"Feature request to show a blank/placeholder panel when selecting a disconnected connection in the tree, improving UX by giving visual feedback instead of showing nothing or stale content.","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/UI/Window/ConnectionTreeWindow.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/Tabs/ConnectionTab.cs","mRemoteNG/Connection/ConnectionInitiator.cs"],"approach":"When a disconnected connection node is selected in the tree, display a blank panel or placeholder with connection info and a Connect button, instead of showing no content or the last active tab."}
